cars.name: Tesla Model S
cars.description: The Tesla Model S is a luxury electric sedan known for its impressive performance and range. It offers a minimalist interior with advanced technology features, including Autopilot capabilities. The Model S provides a smooth and quiet ride, making it a popular choice among electric vehicle enthusiasts.

cars.name: BMW i8
cars.description: The BMW i8 is a plug-in hybrid sports car that combines futuristic design with sustainable performance. It features a carbon-fiber-reinforced plastic body and a hybrid powertrain that delivers both efficiency and exhilarating acceleration. The i8's distinctive scissor doors and aerodynamic lines make it a head-turner on the road.
